duties_responsibilities.duty: Ensure positive customer experience with every interaction
Respond to emergency phone calls, communicate with technicians, schedule work flow
Maintain a strong work ethic with a total commitment to succeed each and every day
Perform administrative and office support activities for multiple supervisors
EXCELLENT PHONE SKILLS IS A TOP PRIORITY
Perform general customer service duties; follow up, phone calls, emails, etc.
Communication is very important in this position as well as customer file- follow-ups
